column1: Which poem did you hear those recitals of last night?
We gave every senator enough opportunity and, sure enough, he succumbed to corruption.
I shaped a good loaf from this dough.
He tries to put everyone who he doesn't like on.
Jackie chased the thief down the street.
The destruction of the city bothered the Mongols.
They lent a bicycle to me.
John talked to anybody who came up to him at the party.
His yearbook picture gives Tom the creeps.
What the thing cost which I ate almost broke me.
